name: Death, Guns & Slippers
description:
War veteran and senior citizen, George, is imprisoned by his family within QUIET, an underground retirement village. Using his military experience, his wit, and his favourite pair of slippers, he has only one chance to escape!

By Clayton Davidson.

Created during his third year of the Bachelor of Information Technology at Otago Polytechnic, 2021.

Supported by tutors Adon Moskal and Grayson Orr.
